```{r knitr_init, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  #Need this chunk to make the images the right size
  #Prevent creation of warning or other message blocks - should be used only
  # when publishing output, so that you remain aware of warnings
  # Alternatively, govspeakr::convert_md(..., remove_blocks=TRUE) can be used
  echo=FALSE,
  cache=FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  # Image size rules for GOV.uk
  fig.width=960 / 72,
  fig.height=640 / 72,
  dpi=72,
  # The default path for mojspeakr::convert_rmd() to check for images is ./graphs
  fig.path = "graphs/"
  )
# Ensure that tables are output as markdown - requires kable (see example below)
options(knitr.table.format = "markdown")
```
